FMLimits.hpp

00001 #ifndef FM_LIMITS_HPP
00002 #define FM_LIMITS_HPP
00003 
00004 #include <limits>
00005 
00022 class FMLimits
00023 {
00024 public:
00026   static unsigned int maxNumOfPartitions() 
00027   { // Partition numbers are represented by "unsigned char".
00028     return 256; // 0-255
00029   }
00030 
00032   static int maxCellWeight() 
00033   { // Cell weights are represented by 28-bit unsigned integer. Note
00034     // that this includes the limits of the weights of clusters.
00035     return 268435455; // 2^28 - 1
00036   }
00037 
00039   static int maxNetWeight() 
00040   { // Net weights are represented by "unsigned short". Note that this
00041     // includes the limit of the weights of the merged nets.
00042     return std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::max(); 
00043   }
00044 
00048   static unsigned int maxDegreeOfCells() 
00049   { // Gains are represented by "short".
00050     return std::numeric_limits<short>::max(); 
00051   }
00052 
00057   static unsigned int maxFanOutOfNets() 
00058   { // The arrays "numA" and "numB" are represented by "unsigned char".
00059     return std::numeric_limits<unsigned char>::max(); 
00060   }
00061 };
00062 
00064 #endif
